short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turbo Converter provides quick access to a unit and currency converter via a widget on your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accurately convert units of measurement and check foreign exchange rates in seconds with our easy-to-use converters. 

How to use the metric & currency converter widget:
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the conversion widget
- To use the unit converter, select units to convert ‘from’ and ‘to’ (e.g. liters to gallons), and enter a value (e.g. 5 L)
- To use the currency converter, select currencies to convert ‘from’ and ‘to’ (e.g. USD to GBP), and enter an amount (e.g. 100)

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
